scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Sandy
scrape.text: This book was difficult for me to rate...I kept going back and forth between 2 and 3 stars. I didn't like the story. To me, the characters were awful and unlikeable. However, the writing was so good, that I had to read it all the way through to see how it would end. Did I like it? Did I *not* like it? Still confused!
